Text: They are the BEST! Thanks mate

great album

but why use BIN? We're not in 1995 anymore...
Is it really so hard to put something up in FLAC format? Seriously.

Not sure if you know tgat ISO format may contain only one track, so it's useless t create an ISO image unless there is only one audio track on the disk.

The reason why the CD is converted to CUE/IMG format is because this way you can mount it and burn as audio disc, convert it to FLAC, APE, OGG or MP3 - just choose your preferred option. 

If you mount the image, you could also get all track information directly from CDDB, freeDb, etc.
